at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.fca.lib.colibri.lib

Class HashRelation

    Relation

    public class HashRelation
extends StdRelation
    A class that implements the interface Relation using ComparableHashSet objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel N. Goetzmann

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Comparable object,
                java.lang.Comparable attribute)
         throws java.lang.ClassCastException,
                java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Adds the pair (object, attribute) to this relation.

        If object is not yet contained in the object set of this relation it will be added to that set. Similarly, if attribute is not yet contained in the attribute set of this relation it will be added to that set.

        If object is null no pair will be added to this relation but attribute will be added to the attribute set of this relation. Similarly, if attribute is null no pair will be added to this relation but object will be added to the attribute set of this relation.

        Parameters:
        object - the object. If this is null, only the attribute will be added to the attribute set.
        attribute - the attribute. If this is null, only the object will be added to the object set
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if object is not mutually comparable with the objects contained in the object set of this relation or attribute is not mutually comparable with the attributes contained in the attribute set of this relation.
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this relation is write protected.

      • commonObjects

        public ComparableSet commonObjects(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Comparable> attributes)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a set of objects which have all the specified attributes.

        More formally, this method returns a set that contains all objects o for which it is true that for all attributes a that are contained in coll the pair (o, a) is contained in this relation.

        Parameters:
        attributes - a collection of attributes.
        Returns:
        the set of objects that have all the attributes contained in the collection attributes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if attributes is null one of the elements contained in attributes is not contained in the attribute set of this relation.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if attributes is null one of the elements contained in attributes is not contained in the attribute set of this relation.

      • commonAttributes

        public ComparableSet commonAttributes(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Comparable> objects)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a set of attributes which are associated with all the specified objects.

        More formally, this method returns a set that contains all attributes a for which it is true that for all objects o that are contained in coll the pair (o, a) is contained in this relation.

        Parameters:
        objects - a collection of objects.
        Returns:
        the set of attributes all objects contained in the collection objects have.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if objects is null or one of the elements contained in objects is not contained in the object set of this relation.
